typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		age as string,
		runningtotal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Source
Source window(asc(id, true),
	Running = toString(sum(toInteger(runningtotal)))) ~> RunningTotal
RunningTotal select(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		age,
		Running
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumn
SelectedColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Incremental_RunningTotal.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SaveToOutputFolder
